>everything in a reply message - this is simply wrong IMO! If you do not

thanx m'lady **curtseys b4 you** yes i was adding the whole message but i
stopped soon there after i was new and had no clue but i think i am doing
better now, and umm i never sweat the small stuff LOL, i was just wondering
